title: OpenAPI 3.0 Operation Metadata Extensions
description: Adds IntelliSense for x-operation-kind extension objects with operational semantics fields (duplicatePolicy, idempotencyMechanism, etc). This schema purposefully validates only the vendor extension surface so it can layer on top of any OpenAPI editor experience.

OperationKindExtension.description: Either a single operation metadata object or an array (to allow future layering).

$ref.description: (Optional) Reference back to components/schemas/OperationMetadata so downstream tooling can still detect the canonical schema source.

kind.description: Coarse semantic category for the operation.

duplicatePolicy.description: Behavior when an identical create request is repeated. Determines idempotency classification.

idempotent.description: Explicit override of inferred idempotency. Leave unset to let tooling derive from duplicatePolicy/kind.

safe.description: True if operation causes no state mutation (pure read).

idempotencyMechanism.description: Mechanism used by the server to detect duplicate submissions.

idempotencyScope.description: Scope within which duplicate detection guarantees apply.

idempotencyKeyHeader.description: Header name required when idempotencyMechanism = idempotency-key (defaults to 'Idempotency-Key').
